title: Crack In The Road Exclusive Mixtape #11: Hot Horizons
body:
Recently selected as Guardian’s 1000th new band of the day (in which we were quoted as part of the ‘buzz’), **Hot Horizons** are beginning to emerge into the limelight.

After we interviewed the band towards the end of last year, they were looking forward to progressing through their single ‘October’ to develop their EP. Released on the 9th May, **All of This** EP  is a fantastic and in depth introduction to a band that many will only be just discovering.  The two brothers of **Hot Horizons** kindly put together an exclusive mix for us here at **Crack In The Road**, and you can listen to it below. Enjoy!

[Hot Horizons – Crack In The Road Exclusive Mix](http://www.mixcloud.com/bencrackintheroad/hot-horizons-crack-in-the-road-exclusive-mix/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=cloudcast_link) by [Bencrackintheroad](http://www.mixcloud.com/bencrackintheroad/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=profile_link) on [Mixcloud](http://www.mixcloud.com/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=homepage_link)
